Interface UserInterface

public interface UserInterface

A general user interface specification.

Version:
Fall 2015 (1)

Method Summary
abstract  boolean askYesNoQuestion(java.lang.String question)
          Asks a question and prompts for a Yes or No response.
abstract  java.lang.String requestString(java.lang.String prompt)
          Prompts then accepts and returns a user-entered string.
abstract  void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
          Shows a message to the user.
 

Method Detail

askYesNoQuestion

boolean askYesNoQuestion(java.lang.String question)
Asks a question and prompts for a Yes or No response. Returns true if user responds Yes; false otherwise.

Parameters:
question - the question to present to the user
Returns:
true if and only if the user indicates Yes

requestString

java.lang.String requestString(java.lang.String prompt)
Prompts then accepts and returns a user-entered string.

Parameters:
prompt - message to show user
Returns:
string entered by user

showMessage

void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
Shows a message to the user.

Parameters:
message - the message to be shown
